comments.text:
Thanks for sharing your holidays with us! The White House is beautiful. How 
fun it would be to help decorate it! My family loved the Bo videos. We're 
dog lovers, too, and we have a rescue dog named Kona! Her name is our way 
of celebrating getting her(she's brownish black) and our delight that the 
Obama family is in the White House! We couldn't be happier or more proud of 
both situations! We wish you a joyous holiday season and a successful last 
year in the White House. Happy holidays,
The Reed Family
Kerry, Noel, Shelley, Daeja & Kona ﻿
comments.author: Noel Reed

religion (or lack of) should not have anything to do with being elected 
president but I do think that a change of pace like that would be really 
interesting. I'm Christian and my best friend (who is Jewish) invited me to 
a Rosh Hashana ceremony at a temple near our college last fall and I'd 
never been to something like that before but I thought it was really 
interesting.
